title: The Numinous and the Moral, CS Lewis, Otto and Vervaeke 34a
description:
There was some anticipation for Vervaeke's Episode 34 after Ep 33. Can science talk about the Holy? 34a covered exactly what CS Lewis did in the first chapter of the Problem of Pain. People have a non-rational sense of the Holy and the Moral but they don't necessarily come together in religion. The Jews put them together and they come together in Jesus. In the Problem of Pain you get Lewis' rough draft of his famous trilemma.
